item.title: Pavement outside 6-14 Underwood Street blocked, 18th June
item.description:
There are cones and tape blocking off the pavement in front of 6-14 Underwood Street N1. The pavement has been blocked off for several days now with no indication of the valid reason. And no indication of length of time or if there is any danger.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Underwood Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pavement blocked by bins and plants, 18th June
item.description:
Pavement outside 228 blocked by overhanging plants and bins left out all week. It is impossible to get my friends wheelchair past when cars are parked there.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Conisborough Crescent, Southend, London

item.title: Pickford lane Avenue Road, 18th June
item.description:
Please can you advise when you will be repainting h road markings in Pickford lane, Avenue Road? The yellow lines are faded out and the zebra crossings?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pickford Lane, Welling, London

item.title: Tree is far too big now, 18th June
item.description:
I love the trees that were planted down Pellerin Rd but we seem to have the bushiest most light-reducing specimen that plunges our house into darkness over the summer months, especially the basement. Gutted. Can’t it be kept trimmed back more?
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Pellerin Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Big items left for many days, 18th June
item.description:
Neighbours of my bubble tea shop constantly putting rubbish next to my shop. It really affects my business as we already losing a lot of walk in customers. I have reported many times and I have to report again as someone dump big items and left there for many days. Why is there no street cleaners cleaning the street? I own shops few places - everyday there is street cleaner cleaning once and some places twice a day. I have been running the shop for 5 years I have so much problem with the neighbours and I just don’t see enough cleaner cleaning the street.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 224, Trafalgar Road, East Greenwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Obstruction on pavement, 18th June

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Walpole Road, Southborough, London

item.title: Hedge blocking pavement on busy school road, 18th June
item.description:
Hedge has not been maintained for months, blocking the pavement leading to school and Bromley train station. Parents with pushchairs and old people on mobilisers need to be really cautious passing here, to be avoided bumped onto the busy Westmoreland Road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Westmoreland Road, Shortlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet
